column4: Hi. i have 4 GB of RAM and running Karmic 64-bit LiveCD, but I'm only seeing 2.9 GB in system monitor. is this normal or is something wrong?
is your video card using shared memory?
oh, and livecd's create ramdisks... might be reserved....
my video card uses shared memory, maybe that's why?? but not up to 1 GB, only 512 MB total
